attributes.action: Stop the Government sending refugees/asylum seekers overseas for "processing"
attributes.additional_details: The policy is inhumane.  We have a duty to support people trying to come here. It puts unnecessary pressure on countries ill-equipped to cope. It fails to prevent human trafficking or criminal gangs and fails to address the real issues.
attributes.background: Prevent Priti Patel from bringing in an inhumane policy that endangers people's lives, puts them at risk if trafficking and does nothing to stop criminal gangs. Stop her from offloading a "problem" to another country ill-equipped to cope.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
